title: ¿Hasta que edad es efectiva la vacunación de mujeres con la vacuna para HPV?
author: Santiago Esteban
description: In this EOP the author analyzes the evidence on the age in which HPV vaccine should be indicated. Two clinical trials andthe recommendations from the CDC are analyzed. The author concludes that the reported benefits to older women are moderate emphasizing the need for Papanicolau smears.
sitename: Evidencia, actualizacion en la práctica ambulatoria
